summary: GPU-accelerated image and video processing framework based on Metal.
name: MetalPetal

script_phases.script:
set -e
set -u
set -o pipefail
cd "${PODS_TARGET_SRCROOT}/Frameworks/MetalPetal/Shaders/"
xcrun metal -target "air64-${LLVM_TARGET_TRIPLE_VENDOR}-${LLVM_TARGET_TRIPLE_OS_VERSION}${LLVM_TARGET_TRIPLE_SUFFIX:-""}" -ffast-math -std=ios-metal2.3 -o "${METAL_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIR}/default.msl23.metallib" *.metal
script_phases.name: Build Metal Library - MSL 2.3
Build Metal Library - MSL 2.3
script_phases.script:
set -e
set -u
set -o pipefail
cd "${PODS_TARGET_SRCROOT}/Frameworks/MetalPetal/Shaders/"
xcrun metal -target "air64-${LLVM_TARGET_TRIPLE_VENDOR}-${LLVM_TARGET_TRIPLE_OS_VERSION}${LLVM_TARGET_TRIPLE_SUFFIX:-""}" -ffast-math -std=macos-metal2.3 -o "${METAL_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIR}/default.msl23.metallib" *.metal

set -e
set -u
set -o pipefail
cd "${PODS_TARGET_SRCROOT}/Frameworks/MetalPetal/Shaders/"
xcrun metal -target "air64-${LLVM_TARGET_TRIPLE_VENDOR}-${LLVM_TARGET_TRIPLE_OS_VERSION}${LLVM_TARGET_TRIPLE_SUFFIX:-""}" -ffast-math -std=ios-metal2.3 -o "${METAL_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIR}/default.msl23.metallib" *.metal
script_phases.name: Build Metal Library - MSL 2.3
Copy Resource Bundle
script_phases.script:
set -e
set -u
set -o pipefail
echo "rsync --delete -av --links --filter "- CVS/" --filter "- .svn/" --filter "- .git/" --filter "- .hg/" --filter "- Headers" --filter "- PrivateHeaders" --filter "- Modules" "${TARGET_BUILD_DIR}/MetalPetal.bundle" "${TARGET_BUILD_DIR}/${UNLOCALIZED_RESOURCES_FOLDER_PATH}/""
rsync --delete -av --links --filter "- CVS/" --filter "- .svn/" --filter "- .git/" --filter "- .hg/" --filter "- Headers" --filter "- PrivateHeaders" --filter "- Modules" "${TARGET_BUILD_DIR}/MetalPetal.bundle" "${TARGET_BUILD_DIR}/${UNLOCALIZED_RESOURCES_FOLDER_PATH}/"
